summary: Resolved two conflicts: accepted deletion of .claude-output.json (ephemeral CI metadata removed by main branch), and merged both versions of docs/concepts/tripwire-cybersecurity-tool/dashboard-ui.md which covered different sprint tasks (Task 1: OIDC auth/API client scaffold from HEAD; Tasks 2-3: WebSocket integration and multi-host selector from origin/main).
strategyUsed: For .claude-output.json: accepted their deletion since it is ephemeral CI metadata. For dashboard-ui.md: preserved both branches' content by merging all sections into a single comprehensive document â€” combined the header metadata, kept all sections from both sides (Project Structure, Route, WebSocket Integration, Authentication, API Client, Multi-Host Selector, Development, Testing, Dependencies, Related Docs), and unified the testing table to cover all test files from both tasks.
